jobDescription: Support business development activities; sell product solutions to architects, designers, and project management consultants; lead generation; maintain client relationships; draft proposals and contracts; assist marketing team; collaborate with sales team.

Ability to work in a team
preferredQualifications: Exposure/experience in using software such as MS Excel, Word, and PowerPoint
